mCtrl Documentation

mCtrl is C open source library for MS Windows, providing a set of user interface controls, that complement the standard set as offered by USER32.DLL and COMCTL32.DLL libraries.

Please check project homepage http://mctrl.sourceforge.net and https://sourceforge.net/projects/mctrl for newer versions and more actual information.

Control Reference

  • mCtrl/button.h - Enhanced button control (window class MC_WC_BUTTON)
  • mCtrl/grid.h - Grid control (window class MC_WC_GRID)
  • mCtrl/html.h - HTML control (window class MC_WC_HTML)
  • mCtrl/mditab.h - MDI tab control (window class MC_WC_MDITAB)

Miscalenous Functions

  • mCtrl/table.h - Table (data model for the grid control)
  • mCtrl/value.h - Value (polymorphic data)
  • mCtrl/version.h - Retrieving mCtrl version
